tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Undergoing hysterectomy surgery can be a very daunting experience, and I was no different. However, I am happy to say that my experience with Dr. Andal was incredibly positive and, for the most part, painless. Dr. Andal is not only a highly skilled surgeon who performs complex surgeries with great success, but she is also exceptionally friendly and empathetic. She truly understands patients' fears and goes above and beyond to ensure that the entire experience is as comfortable and pain-free as possible. Additionally, she is very approachable, answered my questions when needed even over the phone, and visited me post-surgery even on a Sunday to make sure I was doing well. Thank you, Dr. Andal, for making my surgery experience pleasant and painless.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Maternal Care/ Checkup,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: Dr. Andal Reddy mam incredibly attentive, ************** and caring throughout my entire experience. I felt listened to and well taken care of.I highly recommend Andal Reddy mam to anyone in need. She is helpful and always available to answer our questions over phone or message. Dr. Andal Reddy mam and the staff were incredibly attentive, knowledgeable, and caring throughout my entire experience. I felt listened to and well taken care of.I highly recommend Andal Reddy mam to anyone in need. She is helpful and always available to answer our questions over phone or message. Thank you for your dedication and expertise.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ** ***** ***** ** *** **** ****** * **** **** **** ** **** She is soo calm, soo patient, soo friendly that I wonder how does a doctor have all these qualities. She always greets us with a smile and she remembers all our medical history. She has so much positivity in her that our worries/tensions will go away after talking to her. She will listen to all our questions and answers them very clearly. She will make things look light instead of scaring the patients. Just because of Dr Andal Reddy, I decided to have my delivery in Hyderabad instead of my hometown. She used to be available on phone all the time which is a very positive thing about her. I would highly recommend her to all of you who are reading my review. You can close your eyes and go visit the doctor and have a safe delivery. My delivery happened on a festival day when she is on leave and on hearing my status from duty doctor, she rushed to hospital at the right  moment within very less time(though she stays far). Iwish she could be a pediatrician as well so that I would take my kid also to her peacefully :P (just joke but I really wish for it :-)) A simple thanks will not be sufficient for her. Thank you sooooo much mam for making me have a happy and safe delivery and making my pregnancy days go smooth. :-)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I would like to thank Dr Andal Reddy for making me have a happy, safe and normal delivery and making my delivery days go so smooth. She always greet us with a smile which makes everything so easy and positive. She never advised any unnecessary medication and tests. Her positive attitude gave me confidence and made me stay calm and strong throughout my pregnancy. Even on the day of delivery, though I was in so much pain and scared, just by seeing her  made me smile and gave me confidence that now everything will be fine. Thank you so much mam for making my pregnancy  experience so special and beautiful....And I am really gonna miss the monthly visit for checkups and scans 🙂

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: She didn't understand the pain I was suffering and my problem I think. The medication she gave is not given results. ***** ** ********* ******* ****** ****************** * ** ********* *** ********** **** *** **** ** ***** ********* ****** *** ********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ** ***** ***** ** * **** **** *******I had a very good experience through out my pregnancy.I didn't faced any issues during and even after the delivery.Dr Andal Reddy was always approachable and solved all my queries which i had during my pregnancy.She is very polite and friendly and helps her patient feel comfortable. *** ** *** ** *** **** ************ ** *********.She never wrote any unnecessary medicines and tests.She always remember her patient details and make sure all our doubts are well answered.She was always available on phone whenever I needed her support.I would always be grateful to her for making my pregnancy journey so smooth.Highly Recommended.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited for Irregular cycles since 4 months.Doctor is very friendly and listens to every detail with utmost concentration. I visited her 4 years back and was suprised to see she remembered all the details of our conversation.she will prescribe only necessary tests which were done in 15 mins. She suggested no need of any medicines currently on verifying the reportsI came from the hospital smiling ear to ear. Doctors friendliness cures 95% of patients problems. Andal reddy is my go to person in future too. I will higly recommend this doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We are indebted to Andal ma'am for my smooth pregnency. From the day 1 she was very clear about making the journey simple with minimal medicines. She was available all the time for any queries or doubts or any advice. She took utmost care during the pandemic situation making all my visits,scans extremely easy.Considering the Covid situation we also tried to explore other maternity centres but the care, responsiveness and warmth we received from maam was unmatchable.so we continued with maam and are blessed with a baby boy!! Post delivery also she advised and guided for early recovery !! would Highly recommend her !!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We have consulted doctor Andal Reddy madam after receiving postive feedback from online reviews. She is extremely helpful. She diagnosise the problem clearly and explain it to parent with patience and provides only required medication. She is not only a very good doctor but also very good human being. She understands the pain and suffering of patient and provide moral support along with medical support. I took a right decesion by taking my mother to Andal Reddy madam. Citizens hospital also provided very good service with surgery and post surgery process.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: Dr. Andal Reddy has been super patient and was so helpful from the day I conceived through delivery. Being a first time mom, I had many questions and was super exhausted during labor pains, but she didn’t get irritated. Rather she was super supportive. She explains things very nicely and not the kind of doctor who writes many tests for no reason.  She had to attend me very early in the morning for the delivery, yet she came in and talked me through the rough labor pains. Unlike many other doctors (heard from my friends), she tries out for normal delivery only. So, I strongly recommend her, especially if you are going to be mom for the first time.  She is awesome.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

Dr. Andal is not only a highly skilled surgeon who performs complex surgeries with great success, but she is also exceptionally friendly and empathetic. She truly understands patients' fears and goes above and beyond to ensure that the entire experience is as comfortable and pain-free as possible. Additionally, she is very approachable, answered my questions when needed even over the phone, and visited me post-surgery even on a Sunday to make sure I was doing well. tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Andal Reddy Garu has been helping us since pre pregnancy and has helped sort out many issues. She has been extremely helpful and supportive to us throughout the pregnancy. Below are some of the things which we found extremely helpful during our journey

1. Prescribes only required tests
2. Allows only required medications 
3. Tries for normal delivery as much as possible 
4. Extremely helpful during the day of labor - she was in the hospital from 12 midnight till the next day until morning hours until the labor was completed 
5. Clarifies any kind of minor doubts as well with a lot of patience

We are extremely thankful for her help

I would definitely recommend anyone to consult Andal Reddy garu for any Gyneac related issues

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Andal Reddy is highly experienced, most talented, friendly and easily approachable. We were highly satisfied with her throughout the term of pregnancy. She will keep it simple, does not prescribe too many tests/scans/medications. She is the most coolest doctor I have ever seen. I delivered my baby at Citizens hospital for the only reason that Dr. Andal reddy was there, instead of going to my hometown. I strongly recommend her to anyone who is looking for Gynec. In my opinion, *** ** *** **** ****** ** *********. She was very kind enough to pick up our calls in case of any emergency despite the time. She takes utmost care of her patients, listens to us and explains things patiently. Great doctor, great knowledge!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
In a sensitive issue like pregnancy , she is like a perfect antidote .All worries ,anxieties ,speculations , anticipations will be vanished once you are under Doctor Andal Reddy's supervision. Our family treat her like God. No unnecessary tests , pushing hard for normal delivery if patient deserve that , attending patient's(along with family) query with all patience etc. etc. , she is like an ideal case scenario.

May her tribe increase.
Just attend her once ,  see by yourself and  make your pregnancy journey a pleasurable affair.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy Check Up,
review: We are extremely pleased and satisfy with Doctor Andal Reddy. Doctor Andal is having very friendly nature, polite and give enough time to listen problem and understand the problem. My wife started visiting Andal mam after 3rd month of pregnancy and visited till delivery. From April to October visited multiple times and every visit gave my wife relief as she was having lot of questions  and Doctor Andal clarify her questions. She is always reachable and sometimes my wife used to call Doctor Andal and she receives the call and answer her question. With the moral support of Doctor Andal my wife delivered baby boy in October and now it's two month old. I would recommend everyone to visit Doctor Andal. You will be happy to visit her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
One would wish their Doctor to be like Andal Reddy Garu. My pregnancy consultation started with her when she was in Continental hospital. 

She made the pregnancy days of mine so confident that every silly doubt of mine would be answered by her with lot of patience and a beautiful smile. Now me and my baby are all good. She has a very pleasant nature. A part from all these, she’s extremely experienced and talented  to handle her job with ease. Anything related to post pregnancy consultation, I am going to her with all love and confidence irrespective of the hospital she’s working with. ( She is now with Citizens). 

100% I recommend her.  Any one for a happy delivery go choose her as your doctor.

She always prescribed medicine & tests only if it is necessary. She always prefers normal delivery. Highly recommend for all to be moms..

Though our baby was a premie the Doctor explained and assured us safety and health of both mother and baby.My wife's delivery happened in this crisis time of Covid-19. But were treated and things were done on time. Thanks to the Doctors availability.

I would recommend people near to citizens hospital to visit her needing gynecologist. I am happy with pre and post delivery treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We visited Dr. Andal Reddy madam for my wife first pregnancy, she is simple and cool.. she doesn't allow patient to be panic.. she encouraged my wife to go with normal delivery... the moral support she and her team given at labour room was really helped my wife, it was really good. we strongly recommend her for gynic consultation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Andal Reddy has been a motherly figure to me. She has handled my case and pregnancy with utmost care and attention. She was always available on phone and WhatsApp to help and clear out my doubts during my pregnancy. My parents were stress free as she was there to guide us and answer our queries each time. Also she is very polite, friendly and patient in nature.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr. Andal Reddy is a very friendly and positive energy doctor who encourages for normal delivery. After 1 day of On and Off labour, my cervix was not getting dilated for normal delivery, I had asked for c-section. But doctor kept me boosted and encouraged me for normal delivery. After 1 and half day I delivered normally my second baby through the special treatment given by doctor. She deals every case with perfection.
I 100% recommend her for those who want to go for normal delivery.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Labor and Delivery,High-Risk Pregnancy Care,
review:
Andal Madam such a wonderful person you are.  From the second month mine was high risk pregnancy, the confidence she gave and the positivity was soo good. It was my pleasure to meet such a wonderful person. She makes our mind so easy even in critical situation.
She responds to calls and messages proactively. She made my delivery so happy and after delivery also she checks the status of me and my baby on how we are doing. Thank you very much Madam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: First of all Andal Reddy madam is very friendly. Her way of communication is what everyone looks for. My pregnancy checkup and delivery all went well as expected. She treats with care and make us confident. Above all her encouragement and providing positive thoughts is adorable. And it's our pleasure to meet her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: ***** ***** ** * ********* ******* I have 2 kids. Both pregnancies and deliveries were handled by her. Both were normal deliveries.She always has a welcoming smile. She's very cool, confident, friendly with great patience and doesn't paralyze us with unnecessary doubts nor with unnecessary tests. She is always available by phone and responds quickly to even the smallest questions.Her speech is always short and sweet. Her services have already been recommended to many of my friends, and everyone has been happy, so I highly recommend her for any gynecological issues you may have.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Andal Reddy was very helpful throughout my pregnancy and delivery. She explained everything very clearly and answered all the questions I had. During labor she was with me till the baby came out. I normally delivered baby under her guidance and definitely suggest Dr Andal Mam for the new moms. She will suggest the test only if required and educates patient about the issue and also how it can treated. She will definitely try for the normal delivery till the last minute and encourages the patient too. Lastly, I thank her because she was very supportive and friendly. Me and my husband are very happy with the service she provided and the also labor room staff during my delivery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I have visited Dr. Andal Reddy for my wife's first pregnancy. Dr. Andal has treated and advised till 7th month of pregnancy of my wife with all the diagnosis and treatment. In spite of pandemic situation, doctor has given proper time for consultation. We had to travel to our home town for delivery after completion of 7th month pregnancy due to family support and after 9 month of pregnancy we are blessed with a baby girl just one week back. We highly recommend Dr. Andal Reddy for pregnancy check up and consultation. Thank you Doctor.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We went to her for pregnancy check up. She got us scanned and my wife was said to be a 6 week pregnant but with the fetus heart beat missing. She just asked us to wait for 2 weeks more *** ******* **** ** *** ****** *** *** ******* ** ** ********* *** *** *** **** ** *** *********** *** *** ********** My wife got a miscarriage and on the second day i called her (due to lock down) informing her that my wife is getting severe cramps because of the miscarriage. She asked us to have paracetmol/dolo and didnt prescribe us any tablets that could atleast help us to expel the fetus tissues. Now since the natural procedure was not helped by any tablets, the clean up didnot happen properly and now my wife was suggested to undergo minor surgery to get the retained production of conception out. 

I not at all recommend this doctor to anyone. She doesnt take minimum responsibility/care of the patient *** ** * ****** *********** ******* ******* ********* *****
reply_text:
appreciate your feedback  ,  but 
you came for just one visit, when fetal heart is not seen on 1 st scan ,we wait for next scan , 
when you called and told of the problem , you were  asked to come to the hospital for  chek  up   ,and you did not come ,so i cannot tell if minor surgery was really necessary.
all treatment cannot be given through telephone even if it  is  medical treatment.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Visited Andal reddy madam for my wife’s PCOS treatment. We were the last ones to be checked by the doctor. She verified all the previous doctor’s reports and asked us in return on “what to do next” for which we didn’t had the answer.

She just asked to be patient enough and try without any medication for 3 months or so..

Atleast she would’ve explained us on the issue by prescribing some tests.

Overall we aren’t satisfied the way she treated our case.

tags: Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: I started visiting Dr Andal Reddy for my pregnancy checkup during 7th month after checking reviews on Practo itself. The best thing I liked about her is that I do not have to wait in queues for checkup. Due to Andal mam's efforts and experience I was able to do normal vaginal delivery, she acted so calmly during my whole procedure.I would highly recommend Andal mam if you are looking for normal vaginal delivery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review:
Extremely professional and experienced. 

One of the few doctors who encourages for Normal Delivery. She did a great job during my Wife's delivery. As soon as the Citizens staff called her on phone (during midnight) , she was there in no time.

Because of baby's weight we were not confident of Normal Delivery  but Dr.Andal Reddy was able to handle it with ease. Blessed with a baby boy on Feb 26th.

Many thanks to Doctor and her team.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,

Things went well
